definition: to dash/to move forward quickly/to bulge/to protrude/to break through/to rush out/sudden/Taiwan pr. [tu2]
to touch/to make contact with sth/to stir up sb's emotions

sentences.english: Encased at the tip of each 25-foot-long rod are seeds provided by China’s Kunming Institute of Botany.
sentences.chinese: 每个25长的突触顶端嵌有由昆明植物园提供的种子。

sentences.english: The types of synapses and synaptic ultrastructures of the rostrolateral area of G. gecko are the same as that of diurnal reptile.
sentences.chinese: 蛤蚧此区突触类型及超微结构与昼行爬行动物的相同。

sentences.english: "I realised then that synapses were memristors, " he says.
sentences.chinese: 然后他了解到这种神经突触是记忆电阻器，“他说。

sentences.english: Especially, it is comparatively good that the model matches the non-linear performance of the synaptic connection.
sentences.chinese: 尤其是该模型较好地匹配了突触联接的非线性特性。

sentences.english: An individual synapse is thought to be the minimum unit necessary to establish a memory engram.
sentences.chinese: 突触被认为是形成记忆印记的最小基本单位。

sentences.english: Bacteria, of course, don't have synapses or nerve cells.
sentences.chinese: 细菌当然没有突触或神经细胞。

sentences.english: Besides, the forming of neuron synapse have relationships with memory forming, too.
sentences.chinese: 此外，神经细胞突触地形成也与记忆相关联。

sentences.english: Observation of synapse with electron microscope and quantitative examination stereologically.
sentences.chinese: 突触电镜观察及体视学定量检测结果。

sentences.english: Some neurons showed different polysynaptic responses evoked by the same stimulus intensity.
sentences.chinese: 个别细胞在相同刺激强度下，多突触反应的曲线不同。

sentences.english: She and her colleagues determined the size and shape of 6,920 synapses in total.
sentences.chinese: 她和同事们确定了6920个突触的大小和形状。

sentences.english: She and her colleagues determined 11 the size and shape of 6,920 synapses in total.
sentences.chinese: 她和同事们确定了6920个突触的大小和形状。

sentences.english: Morphology of synaptosomes was examined by electron microscope.
Large amounts of synaptic zinc are found in the hippocampus.
sentences.chinese: 大量突触处的锌在海马区发现。

sentences.english: Numerical density on area of synaptic vesicles and synapses were calculated.
sentences.chinese: 测量了突触小泡和突触的面数密度。

sentences.english: Numerical density on area of synaptic vesicles and synapses were calculated.
sentences.chinese: 测量了突触小泡和突触的面数密度。

sentences.english: Myasthenia gravis (MG) is a disorder of the neuromuscular junction that affects communication between the motor neuron and the innervated muscle cell.
sentences.chinese: 肌无力症是一种神经肌肉突触传递功能障碍的疾病。

pinyin: shen2 jing1 jiao1 zhi4 xi4 bao1

definition: neuron/also written 神經元|神经元
myelin sheath (membrane surrounding axon of nerve cell)
